section.title: Update Site Method
section.p:
To install the Eclipse plugin using the Update Site method, follow this procedure:
Start Eclipse.
Go to Help Install New Software Available Software .
Click Add in the Available Software dialog box.
Enter https://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/Eclipse/site.xmlhttps://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Author/Eclipse/site.xmlhttps://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Developer/Eclipse/site.xml into the Location field of the Add Site dialog box.
Click OK.
Select the checkbox.
Click Next and continue with the rest of the installation wizard.
Restart Eclipse when prompted.
Verify that is installed correctly by creating a new XML Project. Go to File New Other and choose
XML Project .
When prompted for a license key, enter the license information received in the registration email.If you already have a native version of installed on your computer, you will not be prompted for a license key for the Eclipse version. The existing license key will be used automatically.

section.title: Zip Archive Method
section.p:
To install the Eclipse plugin using the Zip Archive method, follow this procedure:
Download the zip archive with the Eclipse plugin.
Unzip the downloaded zip archive in the dropins subdirectory of the Eclipse installation directory.
Restart Eclipse.
Verify that is installed correctly by creating a new XML Project. Go to File New Other and choose
XML Project .
When prompted for a license key, enter the license information received in the registration email.If you already have a native version of installed on your computer, you will not be prompted for a license key for the Eclipse version. The existing license key will be used automatically.

section.title: Eclipse Marketplace
section.p: It is also possible to install from the Eclipse Marketplace. Simply search for Oxygen and use the Install button that has instructions when you hover over the button.
